citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:45am on 30-APR-
21. The inspector spoke to the licensee by phone and he was at work and not able to leave to come to the facility for the
inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:45am on 30-APR-
21.  The inspector spoke to the licensee by phone and he was at work and not able to leave to come to the facility for the 
inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
